title: I cannot play online music or video
answer:
When playing music or videos on a web page, please follow the on-screen prompts to download and install the flash plug-in in order to enjoy normal playback. 

 If you still cannot play the music or video after installing the flash plug-in, please perform the following steps: 

 In the browser, open the options menu, select Settings > Advanced > Enable plug-ins and then select Always on. Try again after completing these settings.
